00006 // If true, enable jacobian calculations.
00007 // This adds a 3xN matrix to every body, + 2 3-Vectors.
00008 // so it is not advised for large systems if it is not absolutely necessary.
00009 // Also, this is not required for standard inverse dynamics calculations.
00010 // Will only work with vector math libraries that support 3xN matrices.
00011 #define BT_ID_WITH_JACOBIANS
